backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining product, order, inventory, invoice, and notification types plus comparison modules and storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration script updating secondary admin email state by normalizing the default email into a set.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a specific admin-allowlist feature to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files, modules, and hooks for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light and dark theme variables and component base styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication flow, bootstrap loading, and routing to login, setup, approval, or dashboard.
UI screen for users awaiting admin approval with request-approval and logout actions.
frontend/src/components/AuthenticatedApp: Placeholder app shell shown during bootstrap load, with header, sidebar skeleton, footer, and theme toggle.
frontend/src/components/BarcodeGenerator: Generates Code128 and QR barcodes for a product, handling validation, dynamic library loading, and error states within a dialog.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays a simple footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the top navigation bar with theme toggle, user menu, branding, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/InvoiceGenerator: Generates an invoice image and PDF using canvas drawing based on invoice, customer, and product data.
frontend/src/components/LoadingWorkspace: Shows a full‑screen animated loading interface while the workspace initializes.
frontend/src/components/modules/Analytic: Displays business analytics using stats, orders, inventory, and customer data, including revenue trends, product rankings, and status charts. Restricts financial views based on user role.
frontend/src/components/modules/BarcodeM: Provides barcode scanning for stock in/out operations using camera-based QR scanning. Allows inventory updates with role-based access control and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/modules/Customer: Manages customer records with listing, searching, creating, and deleting, using dialogs and role-based permissions. Shows customer data with form handling and confirmation prompts.
frontend/src/components/modules/Dashboar: Dashboard overview showing metrics, orders, notifications, and status charts with auto-refresh. Access to financial data is restricted based on user role.
frontend/src/components/modules/Inventor: Manages product inventory including listing, searching, creating, editing, scanning barcodes, and generating barcodes. Supports role-based access and low-stock detection.

Generates barcode canvases for products by dynamically loading JsBarcode and jsPDF, validating product data, and preparing barcodes for export. Manages loading, errors, and cleanup of canvas elements.
frontend/src/components/modules/InvoiceH: Displays searchable, filterable, and sortable invoice history with customer/product lookups and invoice preview. Handles permission checks, status badges, date filtering, and invoice export actions.
frontend/src/components/modules/InvoiceM: Allows creating invoices by adding items, validating stock, calculating totals, and generating previews. Enforces role-based access and integrates invoice creation and stock adjustment mutations.
frontend/src/components/modules/Notifica: Lists notifications with relative timestamps, supports marking items as read and refreshing. Shows loading skeletons and unread counts with simple UI interactions.
frontend/src/components/modules/OrdersMo: Manages order listing, filtering, and creation with stock validation and role-based permissions. Supports creating new orders, clearing all orders, and displaying order details with status badges.
frontend/src/components/modules/ProfitLo: Handles profit/loss reporting with date-range selection, access control, data fetching, and export actions, including chart rendering.
frontend/src/components/modules/ReportsM: Aggregates various business reports like sales, inventory, and alerts, with role-based access and summary metrics.
frontend/src/components/modules/Secondar: Manages a list of secondary admin emails with add/remove functionality, validation, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/modules/UserMana: Provides full user approval and management tools including filtering, sorting, profile loading, and admin actions.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Provides a form for new users to enter and save their profile details, including name, email, department, and role.
frontend/src/components/Sidebar.tsx: Displays a role‑based navigation sidebar with module links, supporting both desktop and mobile layouts.
frontend/src/context/PollingContext.tsx: Context provider managing dashboard polling state and active module tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, auto-invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout handling, and identity persistence via a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user, app state, and related backend data with caching and polling integration.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode, and optimized animations for the app UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard layout, loading modules lazily and managing module state, polling, and admin access.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays the login screen and handles authentication via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/utils/invoiceDocument.ts: Contains constants and helper functions for building invoice line items, formatting values, and calculating totals.
frontend/src/utils/stockErrors.ts: Parses backend stock-related errors and converts them into user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the ERP project's state, including existing features and pending feature requests for admin roles, inventory automation, order‑invoice workflows, and dashboards.
